Functions
SetupDefaultMaterialValues
void CObjParser::SetupDefaultMaterialValues(
IMaterialAttrib* 
pMaterial,
std::
map<std::wstring, std::any>* 
pDefaultMaterialValues
)

Assigns the default material values to the material. If a default material is specified in 'pDefaultMaterialValues' then that value is used, otherwise the default value will be used.

Parameters
pMaterial
IMaterialAttrib*

material object to set default values on

pDefaultMaterialValues
std::map<std::wstring, std::any>*

list of default material values

void CObjParser::ParseAscii(
const 
wchar_t 
*
pFilename,
const 
char 
*
pData,
std::
map<std::wstring, std::any> 
*
pDefaultMaterialValues
)

Loads an ASCII encoded OBJ file

Parameters
pFilename
const wchar_t*

Path to the OBJ file. This is only used for resolving paths to textures

pData
const char*

the actual contents of the OBJ file

pDefaultMaterialValues
std::map<std::wstring, std::any>*

map of default material parameters

const 
wchar_t 
*
pFilename,

map<std::wstring, std::any>* 
pDefaultMaterialValues

Loads a mesh from a .obj file
